summary: Comprehensive testing of Brainyx AI chat application completed. All backend APIs (100% pass rate) and frontend features working correctly. Stripe payment integration fully functional - checkout sessions created successfully and redirect to Stripe works.

backend: GET /api/plans - Plans listing with correct prices ($250, $400, $500)
POST /api/auth/register - User registration with 1000 free credits
GET /api/auth/me - Get current user with token
GET /api/usage - Usage endpoint with credits and plan
POST /api/api-keys - API key creation with byx_ prefix
frontend: Landing page loads with all elements (logo, nav, CTA buttons, features)
Login page with email/password form and data-testid attributes
Register page with name, email, password, confirm password fields
Registration flow - creates user and redirects to chat
Chat page displays after registration with welcome message
Settings page with Profile, API Keys, Plans tabs
Profile tab with name, masked email, dark mode toggle
API Keys tab with empty state, create key dialog, key display
Plans tab with 3 plans ($250, $400, $500) and buy buttons
Stripe checkout redirect - successfully redirects to checkout.stripe.com
Stripe checkout shows correct amount (US$250.00 for Promoción)

test_credentials.note: Multiple test users created during testing

seed_data_creation: Test users created in Firebase during testing with 1000 free credits each
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Stripe integration is fully functional with test mode. New users get 1000 free credits. Plans: Promoción ($250/50k credits), Estándar ($400/100k credits), Premium ($500/200k credits). Firebase is used as database. Claude Sonnet 4.5 is the AI model.
